Trinity::

She hugged Nightlight. "Promise me that you, Aerotaur and Windlord 
won't go anywhere. That you'll all stay here with me. OK?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> OOC: thanks.
> 
> Bic:
> 
> "I know, Trinity..." said sweetly and with sadness Nightlight"I 
> know... I'm don'r like neither that anyone of us... It won't 
> happen... Aerotaur is strong... "
> 
> Nightlight hugged the little girl and sat down, she said "That 
won't 
> happen..."
>
